title: Which country is best for business between Turkey and Azerbaijan? - Quora

response.answer_text: If it were up to me, I would invest in Turkey. Turkey straddles Europe and Asia, geographically making it one of the most ideal locations. It’s also on a peninsula, therefore making trade on the Meditteranean Sea, the Black Sea, and the Aegean Sea a breeze. Azerbaijan is equally as qualified. Make sure to find out tax rates (tariffs) and figure out the best benefits. Good luck with your business venture!
